section.para:
The Delegation Service is a new component in Globus Toolkit
&shortversion;. This component provides an interface for delegation of
credentials to a hosting environment. This enables a single delegated credential to
be shared across multiple invocations of services on that hosting environment (e.g. it could be used for multiple GRAM job submissions or across
GRAM and RFT submissions.) It also provides a means for credential
renewal.
